meanings.definition: Able to be easily crushed or broken with a crunching sound.
meanings.sent1: The leaves were so crunchable under my feet.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sat on the crunchable chips, and they made a loud noise!
meanings.sent4: The snow was so crunchable, it felt like stepping on a giant bowl of cereal.
meanings.sent5: The crackers were perfectly crunchable, making them irresistible.

meanings.definition: Capable of being chewed or eaten with a crunchy texture.
meanings.sent1: The apple was so crunchable, it was a joy to eat.
meanings.sent2: The carrots were fresh and crunchable.
meanings.sent3: I love the sound of crunchable snacks when watching a movie.
meanings.sent4: The toast was so crunchable, it felt like biting into a cloud.
meanings.sent5: The popcorn was incredibly crunchable, making movie night even better.
